thread.title: China’s PLA is on a mission for more money

title: China’s PLA is on a mission for more money
text:
China’s PLA is on a mission for more money 10:54am GMT - 02:04 
China’s military wants a bigger budget in order to deal with ballooning security issues like Donald Trump’s threats against North Korea. Reuters' Ben Blanchard says the armed forces are using propaganda to get their point across ahead of the annual military budget release.
